author: Tiyabe   티야베
description:
The 17th Emperor of the Empire was a woman. Purely thanks to the Duke of Roark was she able to overtake the throne against her brothers.

“Your Majesty, I’m ready to follow your will.”

He is the emperor’s loyal supporter; the noblemen bow their heads and wag their tails at his command.  Yet, despite his devotion, the emperor treats him coldly. Little does the public know, that behind closed doors, she belongs to him.

*

In the dead of the night.

The door is wide open and the duke entered the emperor’s room without permission.

“Get out,” he said to the servants, eyes locked on the emperor.

She looked at him and said, “I’m begging you, not tonight…”

Before him, her dignity was useless and authority whisked away. 

“Your Majesty, tonight you enchant me. I’m afraid I can’t hold it in any longer.” His eyes glided over her sweet body and he tore her clothing apart without hesitation. “Sorry, I’m afraid that it may be a rough night.”>
